summary: Comedy set in the world of competitive bar trivia, centering around a group of frustrated academics who finally get a shot at beer, women and nerdy redemption when they enter a citywide trivia tournament.
cast: Christopher Gorham|Arielle Kebbel|Nelson Franklin|Evan Jones|Kip Pardue|Kali Hawk|Ralph Williams|Chris Parnell|Frank Zieger|Julie Glander|Steve Abdo|Nick Parisho|Ethan Gorham|Carrie Royce Fisk|Matt Lockwood|Kojo Asiedu|Brian Balzerini|David Chudnow|Lila Feinberg|Julia Young|Brendt Rioux|Davis Gloff|Marty Bufalini|Geoffrey Beauchamp|Laurie Brown|Michael Sinterniklaas|Simran Grewal|Cindy Chu|Albert Chen|Nelson Beltran|Chris Barr|Brian Bradley Jr.|Ryan Sieg|Patrick Moug|Kef Lee|Bill Lumbert|Nils Johnson|Pamela Croydon|Erin Conrad|Mashay Chapman|Kevin Leistner|Alexander Schostak|Michael Mawilai|Kevin Olmstead|Ted Myers|Ryan Coulter|Theo Williamson|Mike N. title: Answer This!
